summary: Provides the implementation of the Conan CLI 'search' command, which queries the Conan package index (local cache or remotes) using pattern matching, retrieves package metadata via the Conan API, and presents the results in either human‑readable text or JSON format, handling errors appropriately.
business_intent: Enable users of the Conan package manager to discover and inspect available packages and their versions across local and remote repositories directly from the command line, supporting both concise and machine‑readable output for integration into workflows.
